sentences.en: Business flourished and within six months they were earning 18,000 roubles a day.
sentences.cn: 生意红火起来，不出6个月他们就可以每天赚18,000卢布了。

sentences.en: Charlie was earning eight pounds, I was earning five.
sentences.cn: 查利赚了8英镑，我赚了5英镑。

sentences.en: Fines are meaningless to guys earning millions.
sentences.cn: 罚款对挣大钱的人来说无关紧要。

sentences.en: He had shot three people dead earning himself a reputation as a tough guy.
sentences.cn: 他因枪杀三人得到了暴徒的恶名。

sentences.en: He is all for players earning what they can while they are in the game.
sentences.cn: 他完全赞成现役运动员尽可能多赚钱。

sentences.en: He started earning serious money only in the sixties.
sentences.cn: 他在60年代才开始挣大钱。

sentences.en: He tried many ways of earning, in the end he became a farm labourer.
sentences.cn: 他试过许多谋生之道, 最后他做了农场工人.

sentences.en: He was a high-earning broker with money to burn.
sentences.cn: 他是高收入的经纪人，有花不完的钱。

sentences.en: He was earning £215 a week before tax: take-home pay, £170.
sentences.cn: 他税前的周薪是215英镑，实发170英镑。

sentences.en: I was doing quite well, but I wasn't earning a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 我干得还算不错，可是挣的钱却不算多。

sentences.en: I was earning a lot of money, but that was not the issue.
sentences.cn: 我赚很多钱，但那不是最重要的。

sentences.en: It bases its figures on what it might, hypothetically, be earning on past investment.
sentences.cn: 这些假定的可能收益数字是依据过去的投资得出的。

sentences.en: So how do you approach this potential clientele to maximize your earning at the end of the month?
sentences.cn: 因此在当月末你怎样对待你的潜在的客户从而达到最大化你的收入？

sentences.en: The boy has reached an adult age and ought to be earning his own living.
sentences.cn: 这孩子已经(到了)成年,应该自食其力了.

sentences.en: What do you want for more money for? Y ou're earning good pay as it is!
sentences.cn: 你为何还要更多的钱? 你现在的工资就不少了!

phrases.tran_cn: 利润率；生产能力；收入额

trans.tran_cn: 赚得( earn的现在分词 )，挣钱，生（利），获（利）
